Because of these changed market conditions as well as the improvements in our performance and outlook made possible through the support of the U.S. and Canadian governments, Chrysler intends to repay these loans in full at the earliest opportunity, he added. According to Mr Zahi Hawass , the Egyptian Museum` s collection is secure from thieves. He said the greatest threat to the collection inside was posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Mr Zahi Hawass said.
